hero.title: ESN General Assembly Prague 2026
hero.subtitle: The annual decision-making gathering where ESN sections meet to align on strategy, community priorities, and the year ahead.

chips.value: Prague University of Economics and Business (VŠE)

items.value: Official ESN decision-making event for sections and stakeholders.
Focus on strategy, knowledge exchange, and community priorities for 2026.
Mix of plenary sessions, workshops, and networking moments.
Hosted in Prague with a local organising committee.
Attendance by registered ESN delegates and invited guests.

localsRecommend.name: Charles Bridge
localsRecommend.description: Iconic 14th-century bridge with stunning views of the Vltava and Prague Castle. Best visited at sunrise.
